name: Pizza clicking center & restaurant delivery mania – The Food click frenzy - Free Edition
name_original: Pizza clicking center & restaurant delivery mania – The Food click frenzy - Free Edition
description:
TRY OUR PIZZA CLICKING CENTER & RESTAURANT DELIVERY MANIA – THE FOOD CLICK FRENZY GAME

Do you love pizza?

Now, be prepared for the endless hours of fun and entertainment. Cooke as much pizza you can by clicking or tapping on giant pizza as fast you can to create more pizza. If you have enough pizza then visit the shop to upgrades to cook more pizza.

Features:

- Amazing graphics and effects
- Cool soundtrack
- Easy to play to but difficult to win
---------------------------
How to play?

- Keep tapping on pizza to create more
- Trip to the shop and use your pizzas to upgrades so you can bake more quickly

DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>> PIZZA CLICKING CENTER & RESTAURANT DELIVERY MANIA – THE FOOD CLICK FRENZY GAME

We want your feedbacks! Let's work together to improve your game experience!
